---
title: "Limitações de sumários estatísticos"
output: html_notebook
theme: sandstone
---

```{r warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(datasauRus)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
glimpse(datasaurus_dozen)
```


```{r}
datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  summarise_all(funs(mean, sd, median))
```

## Correlações

```{r}

datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  summarise(correlacao = cor(x, y))

```


## Boxplots

```{r}
datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = dataset, y = y)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```

Mas quando olhamos os dados todos...

```{r}
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x=x, y=y, colour=dataset))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_void()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol=3)

```


```{r}
datasaurus_dozen %>% 
    filter(dataset == "dino") %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y, colour=dataset))+
    geom_point(size = 2)+
    # theme_void()+
    theme(legend.position = "none") + 
    labs(title = "Lembre de mim!")
```
